item.title: IDEA Vim
item.description: IDEA Vim I’ve been using the IdeaVim plugin in Android Studio for a while. I only ever learned the basics, but that’s been enough. The best part is that even this small amount of Vim carries over everywhere: I can use the same workflow in Android Studio, VS Code, iTerm, or Obsidian. Most editor shortcuts I used to know are gone, and I don’t miss them. IDEA Vim config Here’s my .
